text: The Mongolia national korfball team is managed by the Mongolian Korfball Federation (MKF), representing Mongolia in korfball international competitions. They became an International Korfball Federation in 2010.http://www.swanfund.org/2010/11/mongolia-joins-as-58th-member-of.html ==References== Category:National korfball teams Category:Korfball in Mongolia
title: Mongolia national korfball team
